ee sidu wunu siduwima.lokka kadawasam kollek,suddith pirimiyekta issarahinuth balala passa harilath balanna hithena itikiris kellak,denna keti kalakinma premawanthayo dennek bawata path una,mal uyane banku wala,chithrapata shalawe dennage aadaraya nagalama gihin thibuna,kama mese,the mese me dennawa ath deka patalagena inna dasuna nirantharayenma anek kollo kellanta dakinna labuna.hariyata romiyo juliyat wage thada law ekak.dennage aadaraya keti kalak mehema yanakota me dennage aadaraya maddata thawa ekek kada path wenawa,,ee podda,podda lokkata wada kadawasam hariyata holiwud naluwek wage porak,wadi dawasak yanne na,poddata suddi gana hithak pahala wenawa,podda ara dennage aadaraya dana danama suddi passe yanna gannawa,pora bahalama trayi eka suddige aadaraya laba ganna,wadi dawasak yanne na lokkata mitar wenawa podda suddi passe pannanawa kiyala,kipa warakma lokka poddata anathuru agawanawa sinkon eken ayin weyan kiyala,eeth suddige lassanata washi unu podda neme parajaya bara aragena sin eken ayin wenne.poddath suddige passenmayi,suddi yana yana than wala poddath passen.kemen kemen suddige hithath himita podda dihawata adenna aragena,mokada poddata suddige aasanna wayasemayi,aneka itha kadawasam penumak poddata thiyenne,lokka ehema handiyek neme.suddige hithath podda podda kandamata adenawa wage podda dihawata yanna aragena,tiken tika lokkawa maga arinnath aragannawa,lokka inne dan asu haradahata thada wela,lokkage iwasime simawath paninawa mokada

eksath jathitha pakshaya waliweriya siddhiya sambandhawa pasugiyada kolambaa di madhya sandarshanayaka niyaluna bawath thaman kumak karanawada, monawa karanawada yanna pawa amathaka wi ehidi kriya kala bawath nahimiyo penwa dethi.eda eksath jathika pakshaya sihiwikal wi hasirunu bawath, mawa, piya, akka, nangi nohandunana lesa kriya kala bawath penwa dena nahimiyo eyata hondama udaharanayak lesa himinamakage karata atha damagena udghoshanaye yedima penwa dethi.mewani awasthawakata bhikshun wahansela sahabhagiwana wita thama gaurawaya rakena paridi kriyakirimata unwahansela sitha gatha yuthu bawath eewa sanwidhanaya karannan bhikshun wahanselage gaurawaya rakena paridi kriya kala yuthu bawath nahimiyo pawasuha.swaminwahanse namakage karata atha damagena eksath jathika paksha manthriwarayeku pasugiyada udghoshanayaka yedima ithama anadarshayak bawath ema manthriwaraya me sambandhawa samawa ayada sitiya yuthuª bawath jathika samagiya sandaha wu anthar aagamika sandhanaye sama sabhapathi sarath hettiaarachchi piyathuma pawasayi.shri lankika samajaya ha aasiyanu samajaya aagamika nayakayanta, ethumanlage andina andumata pujaniya lesa garu karana bawada piyathuma penwa deyi.mema eksath jathitha paksha manthriwaraya himinamakage karata atha damagena deshapalanaya kirimata hakiyayi sitha sitiyath eya samastha samajayama hela dakina katayuththaki.
